scripts.start: npx prisma generate && keystone prisma migrate deploy && keystone start
scripts.deploy: keystone build && npx prisma generate && keystone prisma migrate deploy && keystone start
scripts.prepare-render: npm run verify-deployment && echo 'âœ… Proyecto listo para Render. Ve a DEPLOY_RENDER.md para instrucciones.'
scripts.clean:cypress: rm -rf cypress/screenshots cypress/videos cypress/downloads && echo 'ðŸ§¹ Archivos temporales de Cypress eliminados'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:cypress && rm -rf node_modules && echo 'ðŸ§¹ Limpieza completa realizada'
scripts.env:setup: npm run env:check || npm run env:create
scripts.env:create: cp env.example .env && echo 'âœ… .env creado desde env.example - EDITA .env con tus valores'
scripts.env:create-test: cp env.test .env.test && echo 'âœ… .env.test creado desde env.test'
scripts.test:db:reset: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e env.test -- npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.test:db:migrate: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e env.test -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.test:db:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e env.test -- ts-node cypress/support/seed.ts
scripts.cypress:open: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e env.test -- cypress open
scripts.cypress:run: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e env.test -- cypress run
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:setup && sleep 5 && npm run test:db:migrate && npm run test:db:seed && npm run cypress:run && npm run test:teardown
scripts.test:e2e:dev: npm run test:setup && sleep 5 && npm run test:db:migrate && npm run test:db:seed && npm run cypress:open
scripts.test:db-integration: cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e env.test -- npx ts-node utils/__tests__/loan-database-integration.ts
